title: Weekly Product Pulse: Oct 20-26
overview: This week's product pulse highlights critical functional issues and user experience feedback. Key areas include user login problems and UI/UX concerns regarding portfolio clarity and feature requests for direct trading integration and a 'kill switch'. These insights are crucial for product improvements and strategic planning.

themes.name: Slow, Glitches
themes.summary: A critical functional issue emerged as users reported being unable to log in to the application.

themes.name: UI/UX
themes.summary: Users expressed interest in new features like direct trading integration and a 'kill switch', alongside concerns regarding the clarity of the current portfolio visualization.

quotes: Slow, Glitches: why I am not able to login growws application
UI/UX: trade directly in trading view to place order
UI/UX: Portfolio is shown as dots in this app. No clarity at all.
actions: Investigate and resolve the critical login failure reported by users.
Prioritize research into the feasibility and user demand for direct trading integration and a 'kill switch' feature.
Review and enhance the clarity of portfolio visualization, specifically addressing feedback regarding the 'dots' representation.
